item.title: New Evangelical Movement
item.description: The inventor of the new evangelical movement is Charles Finney. Here are weblinks: year 2005 新布道运动：一百多年前开始的偏差 year 2005 决志而受洗的必然得救吗？ year 2007 新布道运动：一百多年前开始的偏差
